question:
The Annual Ganges River Dolphin Census started in October. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The census will cover the entire River Ganga.
  2. The census will make use of Direct Counting Method instead of the previously used Tandem Boat Survey Method.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The census will cover the Upper Ganga region between Hastinapur Wildlife Sanctuary and Narora Ramsar Site. This is a stretch of about 250km in Uttar Pradesh. The 2019 census has added an extra 30km to the area covered last year. It is a joint exercise between WWF and UP Forest Department. Statement 2 is incorrect: Last year the Direct Counting Method was used. In 2019, the Tandem Boat Survey Method was used. It was developed by ecologist Gill Braulik. It consists of a pair of inflated boats that move in tandem and count the dolphins.
